items.sentence: I think that the boy over there is Tom's brother.
I think baseball is more popular than basketball.
I try not to drink caffeinated drinks very often.
You can't park your car there without permission.
Tom walked down the gravel road towards his farm.
People are afraid to walk around here after dark.
Do you have any bad habits? If so, what are they?
I half expected to see Tom walk through the door.
I hope that Tom will have the courage to show up.
You don't have to read this if you don't want to.
Do you think Boston is a dangerous place to live?
Tom's behaviour is unpredictable when he's drunk.
Tom said he didn't want to sleep in the basement.
I thought that I told you not to do that anymore.
Don't you think that it would be wise to do that.
Let's play something that everybody can dance to.
My brother and I take turns cleaning our bedroom.
Tom pulled Mary into his arms and held her close.
Unless I'm mistaken, I've seen that woman before.
We all got in Tom's van and headed for the beach.
